revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: [[Inventec]] • PCB ID: 6050A2350601-MB-A01
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @1.0GHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0/ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: [[Winbond]] 8MB (SPI NOR) Flash *Memory: [[SK hynix]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/2.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://www.wysechoice.co.uk/p/dell-wyse-3010-xenith-2-0f-1g-909576-02l Spec.]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Dell Wyse 3010-T00X Top.jpeg|Board top File:Dell Wyse 3010-T00X Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
